column3:
“This is a fantastic Sativa that is deceptively strong. The smells of its parents are quite strong, with the Cheese and PIneapple parents standing out in the scent. The unmistakable skunk is sort of a subtle background player on this one, and that's not necessarily a bad thing (since it allows the pineapple, in particular, to stand out).

The effects are definitely Sativa. It's a creeper - when you first hit it, you f...”

“I suffer from degenerative joint disease in both knees caused by osteoarthritis and picked up an eighth of this strain on the recommendation of the budtender at the Medicinal Oasis in Denver. I used a DaVinci vape the first couple of times I tried it and smoked it the third.

The first time I used it was after a day of hiking and my knees at a pain level of 7 on a scale of 1 to 10. Within about 5 minutes of using it,...”
“i think i time traveled.”

“Great energetic body high with a heavy stone head high.
Waves of euphoria pulsate through your body.
The scent of the herb is like a sweet fruit candies.
And earthy minty overtones. Lung expansion felt.
Long lasting burn in joints/blunts. Great in a vaporizer.
A bit of throat harshness similiar to Trainwreck.
Effects instantly onset, didn't feel like a creeper.
Excellent pain relief, excellent euphoric energet...”

“Although there are many strains out there with intense highs, Pineapple Chunk is similar, but the reason I have given it such a rating is not due to the fact the high is intense but the high itself, smoking this strain offers the best high of all the buds I've smoked and I've smoked plenty, it relaxes you, makes you chilled, happy, really intense giggles and super super high”
“The pain killing property's for this strain are incredible. The high hits hard fairly quickly and the taste is phenomenal. A complete full body high.”

“Not that it matters but got a couple of Grams that was on the $15 dollar shelf at the shop.  First pull off the bud was quite awesome with sweet pungent fruity scents and a touch of sweet pineapple.  Smells so good you will want to eat it!  Smokes a little fast but very smooth on in and out with a grilled pineapple taste that made my mouth water a bit.  Heavy duty body buzz at first with a high head buzz but not to f...”
“Pineapple Chunk is a GREAT strain! I highly recommend this strain to all Indica lovers as this strain puts you in a very good narcotic stone. Huge beautiful chunks of Bud, that smells AMAZING!”

“Tried every pineapple strain but this one up to this point.

Smoked the flower pineapple chunk - SO SO SMelly - sweet and pungent.

Good lord, This shit will get you  HIGH. 
Im a medical patient and try every new strain I find, for those who sometimes find it hard to get high after being a daily user - this is your jolt of re freshness.”

“This strain was my first medical pick up.  I have chronic pain, muscle spasms and depression.  I got a 1/2 O from BostonCana.  The first thing I noticed was the trim and production of my pic up was outstanding.  The grow they have going on at Boston Cana is awesome.  I'm sleeping again, I used to have trouble getting out of bed in the mornings,  but a wake and bake with this stuff puts you on your feet with a smile a...”

“Yum.  My god this strain tastes good.  Like spicy pineapple. :)

Really great strain all around, great for stomach and muscular pain in my experience.  It chills me out, but doesn't make me sleepy. 

Definitely a favorite.”
“Great heavy hitting indica. Dab before bed to help sleep or use during the day for a relaxing couch lock.”

“Amazing medicinal strain. Makes me really happy & relaxed. Great for pain as well. I have fibromyalgia, depression, anxiety and PTSD - and Pineapple Chunk is effective in treating all of them. My fibromyalgia was acting up but when I smoked this it immediately started to melt away. A great balanced hybrid. Has a sweet, fruity & pineapple flavor profile, as its name suggests. You can smell the pineapple in the leaves ...”

“🍍🍍🍍Pineapple Chunk is a great hybrid strain!!! I found it a very chatty buzz  which I thoroughly enjoy...very uppity and then brings you down to a nice relaxing high in a smooth transition.  When I see any strains by Barneys Farm I buy them and love them.  🍍🍍🍍”
“Felt a huge buzz of energy, now lying here one hour later in couchlock but huge uplifted mood and amazing head high overall”

“I don't why, but when I smoke pineapple chunk, I find myself watching over-the-top action movies, while standing. That's to say, I can't help but stand up, through an entire movie. 

I don't find this strain to be energizing, but rather calming and curious. The strain is also conducive to calling up friends with business proposals and the fleeting need to bake cookies. 

I guess what I'm trying to say is--Pineapple C...”

“🍍🍍🍍Pineapple Chunk is a great hybrid strain!!! I found it a very chatty buzz  which I thoroughly enjoy...very uppity and then brings you down to a nice relaxing high in a smooth transition.  When I see any strains by Barneys Farm I buy them and love them.  🍍🍍🍍”

“At Amnesia AMS with vape at 188. Soft fluffy nugs, lots of trichromes under the mic. Strong pine and fruit smell, mello and smooth vapor with candy-piney taste. A bit of berry mixed in.

Clearly indica effects, likely 300 mikes in 2 bags and still absolutely zero cerebral effect. Muscles relaxed, calm, content.”
“This is one of my main strains that I use daily. The smell brings me back to my Maui roots, and the high is a perfect mixture of gotta get shit done"
column5: I'm really chilled out". It is a wonderful mood enhancer. I use it to combat my mood swings from my anti-seizure meds. If I had to pick one strain for the rest of life

column3: “This smells like all of its parents combined: pineapple, cheese and skunk. It's a decent hybrid.”

“Made me relaxed  & lazy but not in a bad way. Pain relief, calming, no headache. I'm a medical user. I am trying to find the right one and looking for pain relief, mood lifting, and maybe a little energy.  For me, this is only for nighttime.”
“Experienced increased heart rate and a very cerebral high.  Interesting for an indica as I was up most of the night.”

“What a 💥delight for the senses in this earthy, skunky, cheesey, tropical 🏝 hybrid-treat! Aroma is mango + pineapple 🍍-galore, while flavor is def skunk +🧀cheese — w/mango undertones + true pineapple aftertaste.. delish! Smooth💨smoke & immediately uplifting—> not racy/too much for my anxiety/adhd.. i highly recommend this 5⭐️ strain!”

“This is a decent strain for managing Neurological pain due to Multiple Sclerosis. It does keep me focused! Uplifting and good for daytime use. Not my favorite daytime strain, but better than many I have tried! ❤️❤️❤️”

“What a 💥delight for the senses in this earthy, skunky, cheesey, tropical 🏝 hybrid-treat! Aroma is mango + pineapple 🍍-galore, while flavor is def skunk +🧀cheese — w/mango undertones + true pineapple aftertaste.. delish! Smooth💨smoke & immediately uplifting—> not racy/too much for my anxiety/adhd.. i highly recommend this 5⭐️ strain!”
“This is my favorite strain. My caregiver keeps this one going. The tastiest most pleasant buds so far. I'm a medical Michigan patient and have had 200+ strains”
“Pinapple chunk is a wonderful strain great for anytime of the day and the terpers smell amazing and taste great”

“Pretty damn nice herb! Just grew out 3 of these for 10 weeks even though you could of had them at 8. One came out really pineapply, one really cheesy and one more like the original skunk weed. All were delicious crystal coated dense mid-size nuggets of heavily milky-frosted, velvety green buds with rusty yellowy, orange hairs. The effect is strong and happy and the flavour is awesome - like a pineapple and cheese sti...”

“This is my New Favorite. It is miss named though I am thinking more cobra venom. The nugs are full of THC crystals smelling slightly of citrus. I made Ice cube from Red Bull and dropped into my ice catcher. I immediately felt the smoke filling my lungs to capacity, then came the expansion and coughing. Too big a hit. I can feel the euphoria starting to over take my head by the second hit. Anyone with ADHD I would rec...”

“very nice strain a hardhitter even for me a cannabis grower for many years it blew my fucking sooks of very strong indica i think the yield is okay because of the quality of herb nice taste very good strain for new growers easy to handle and resin monster if the temperature i right if you have problems sleeping try this strain it will knock you on your ass...much respekt too barnes farm Joe CPH”

“This is a decent strain for managing Neurological pain due to Multiple Sclerosis. It does keep me focused! Uplifting and good for daytime use. Not my favorite daytime strain, but better than many I have tried! ❤️❤️❤️”

“Pineapple Chunk has a sweet aroma with skunky undertones. The smell is pretty potent, but ultimately pleasant.

This strain produces an incredibly potent head high. The first half an hour of the high, I was engrossed in an amazing state of euphoria complete with some mild visual hallucinations. After that first wave passed, I was left in a pleasant, relaxed state. This entire high felt amazing. The intense head rush ...”

“Very pretty flower with rich tones vibrant orange greens and deep purple. I was surprised that it tasted nothing like citrus tangy pineapple. On the contrary the flower smokes so smooth that you have to search through the earthy tones for the sweet finish. A great day smoke an exceptional wake and bake for and all day dose of peace. Noticeable body high with great pain relief and all day boost of happiness. Helps to ...”

“Pineapple Chunk has a sweet aroma with skunky undertones. The smell is pretty potent, but ultimately pleasant.

This strain produces an incredibly potent head high. The first half an hour of the high, I was engrossed in an amazing state of euphoria complete with some mild visual hallucinations. After that first wave passed, I was left in a pleasant, relaxed state. This entire high felt amazing. The intense head rush ...”

“This is a decent strain for managing Neurological pain due to Multiple Sclerosis. It does keep me focused! Uplifting and good for daytime use. Not my favorite daytime strain, but better than many I have tried! ❤️❤️❤️”

“Pretty damn nice herb! Just grew out 3 of these for 10 weeks even though you could of had them at 8. One came out really pineapply, one really cheesy and one more like the original skunk weed. All were delicious crystal coated dense mid-size nuggets of heavily milky-frosted, velvety green buds with rusty yellowy, orange hairs. The effect is strong and happy and the flavour is awesome - like a pineapple and cheese sti...”

“This is the strain that you keep inside hour modified life alert necklace. 

After spending a day with my friend and her five kids, I feel like I have fallen and I can't get up.

This sticky icky will make you forget  all about them kids after about ten min. This stuff is like a fancy drink at TGifridays. You have two and can't feel nothing, then bam! You are ordering ten entrees and getting white girl wasted like yo...”
“Pinapple chunk is a wonderful strain great for anytime of the day and the terpers smell amazing and taste great”

“Grown this strain, 2 phenos. 1 had a very sweet pineapple scent. The other one was a typical Cheese mix, it had the outstandig cheese smell. Smoked this one, its a bit trippy, if you have anxiety dont use this cause it will creep the shit out of you. Take it easy on and you''ll be good for the evening. I recommend this for late night sessions, because the effects are calm. A hard hitting indica what leaves you on the...”
“Holy shit. You know that feeling when you just want to listen to music? This is a great head high.”
“Great Indica body effects along with a great buzz!  A+on the pain killing associated with MS.  Although I wouldn’t use if trying to get to sleep.  Awesome taste when vaped in a Volcanoe!”
“Lovely long lasting relaxed high ! Good strain to watch films too 👌”
“A very hard hitting strain that will keep you medicated for hours, with a dominant cheese sour taste. This will take all your worries away with just one bowl, but I recommend ten :)”

“Fat dense buds that are a beautiful green, covered in long bright orange and yellow calyxes. The plant produced some very legendary sized buds. The smell is tropical and spicy, with a slight pungency. The flavor was sweet and skunky. Very smooth. It had a thick dense smoke, that was delicious on the exhale. The high was incredible. Very intense and euphoric. As an experienced smoker, I can honestly say this strain wa...”
“Nice head buzz. Makes the smoker very happy and uplifted. Gives small burst of energy then mellows out. Tastes very much like the name suggests.”
“Great for relaxing and just being happy”

“Very mellow and relaxing but not so heavy that I felt couch locked. Sometimes I felt a little dizzy and drunk and had to remember that I wasn't drinking, but other than that it was pleasant. What I liked the most was that I didn't feel nervous at all. This is a chill one for watching a funny movie.”
“Great for parties, projects, going out, and cruising.”

“I definitely enjoy this strain. Gives me alot of enjoy and the want to always be moving. I can't really say I would like to do anything other than just Dance alot when I'm on this strain. I would save this for when you're going to be doing something fun. Recommend!”
“Great for parties, projects, going out, and cruising.”

“Very mellow and relaxing but not so heavy that I felt couch locked. Sometimes I felt a little dizzy and drunk and had to remember that I wasn't drinking, but other than that it was pleasant. What I liked the most was that I didn't feel nervous at all. This is a chill one for watching a funny movie.”
“Holy shit. You know that feeling when you just want to listen to music? This is a great head high.”
“Very tasty , fruity , nice big buds , fragrance”

“Fat dense buds that are a beautiful green, covered in long bright orange and yellow calyxes. The plant produced some very legendary sized buds. The smell is tropical and spicy, with a slight pungency. The flavor was sweet and skunky. Very smooth. It had a thick dense smoke, that was delicious on the exhale. The high was incredible. Very intense and euphoric. As an experienced smoker, I can honestly say this strain wa...”

“I just tried this last week and it was a very different experience than I am used to. I felt focused, calm, but motivated to do things. I'm used to weed relaxing me, and this felt more like a firm but gentle push to get my shit together. It was odd, but not unpleasant. Don't smoke if you want a calm and relaxing evening, smoke if you want to clean your house and listen to music and make do some meal prep.”

“This review is for Blue Pineapple Chunk (Blue Dream x Pineapple Chunk). I'm leaving the review here since that particular strain doesn't have it's own leafly page yet.
This strain is the absolute shit. It looks beautiful, tastes great, isn't too harsh of a smoke, and it's one of the more relaxing sativa dominant strains that I've experienced in my 8 years of smoking. I find it to be a fairly focused high that's been ...”

“I just tried this last week and it was a very different experience than I am used to. I felt focused, calm, but motivated to do things. I'm used to weed relaxing me, and this felt more like a firm but gentle push to get my shit together. It was odd, but not unpleasant. Don't smoke if you want a calm and relaxing evening, smoke if you want to clean your house and listen to music and make do some meal prep.”

“I'm still smiling.

I like that in a strain. it lifted my spirits immediately. It also knocked out my migraine. I mixed it 50/50 with Harle-Tsu for added pain relief and because the CBD takes edge off of racing heart and anxiety. 

The taste is great, like a pinata colada, with a nice aroma--you can smell the funky cheese but it's just enough to keep it interesting. I really love it.”

“This review is for Blue Pineapple Chunk (Blue Dream x Pineapple Chunk). I'm leaving the review here since that particular strain doesn't have it's own leafly page yet.
This strain is the absolute shit. It looks beautiful, tastes great, isn't too harsh of a smoke, and it's one of the more relaxing sativa dominant strains that I've experienced in my 8 years of smoking. I find it to be a fairly focused high that's been ...”

“if you had to pick only one strain to grow this would be it it is a good Indica sativa with more sativa characteristic than indica what I mean is you can smoke this in the morning and smoke it all day long and get a lot of stuff done it is a very good motivating strain very productive and you focus and you get a little bit of pain pill with this as well don't recommend smoking this at night to relax or wine down in f...”
“Great for relaxing and just being happy”

“done a couple these last year and absolutely loved the cheesy pineapple mix of tastes and smells. a glorious bouquet. mad awesome THC levels and one that can put you to sleep fast. the leafly review says some report a jolt of sativa-esque raciness but really only if you wake and bake it. used at night it can sleep your ass good. a true pleasure 10/10 -El Kevo”
“i have shatter form of this and very nice.  its got a strong terpene flavor which I love and it relaxes me instantly”
“I tried this strain as shatter.  it was very tasty and the high was more indica.  I would definitely buy this again or try it as bud. ⛽🔥🍍”
“i have shatter form of this and very nice.  its got a strong terpene flavor which I love and it relaxes me instantly”
“I tried this strain as shatter.  it was very tasty and the high was more indica.  I would definitely buy this again or try it as bud. ⛽🔥🍍”
“A smooth, great tasting smoke. Not harsh. Very quick to act.”
“A very hard hitting strain that will keep you medicated for hours, with a dominant cheese sour taste. This will take all your worries away with just one bowl, but I recommend ten :)”

“Fat dense buds that are a beautiful green, covered in long bright orange and yellow calyxes. The plant produced some very legendary sized buds. The smell is tropical and spicy, with a slight pungency. The flavor was sweet and skunky. Very smooth. It had a thick dense smoke, that was delicious on the exhale. The high was incredible. Very intense and euphoric. As an experienced smoker, I can honestly say this strain wa...”
“Nice head buzz. Makes the smoker very happy and uplifted. Gives small burst of energy then mellows out. Tastes very much like the name suggests.”

“Very mellow and relaxing but not so heavy that I felt couch locked. Sometimes I felt a little dizzy and drunk and had to remember that I wasn't drinking, but other than that it was pleasant. What I liked the most was that I didn't feel nervous at all. This is a chill one for watching a funny movie.”
“The smell is so strong, but mouthwatering. Energetic yet soothing. The buds are dense and sparkle with goodness.”
“Nice head buzz. Makes the smoker very happy and uplifted. Gives small burst of energy then mellows out. Tastes very much like the name suggests.”
“Dark green buds of varying sizes. Has an earthy taste and a slightly fruity hint to it. Overall slow with effects taking about 15-20 mins to take place but extremely relaxing with a crazy headbuzz.”
“A smooth, great tasting smoke. Not harsh. Very quick to act.”
“Very tasty , fruity , nice big buds , fragrance”
“A very hard hitting strain that will keep you medicated for hours, with a dominant cheese sour taste. This will take all your worries away with just one bowl, but I recommend ten :)”
“Pineapple chunk is a favourite strain to grow and  we love her sweet citrus taste that will make you remember this strain forever !”
“The smell is so strong, but mouthwatering. Energetic yet soothing. The buds are dense and sparkle with goodness.”
“Great for relaxing and just being happy”
“The smell is so strong, but mouthwatering. Energetic yet soothing. The buds are dense and sparkle with goodness.”
“Makes me wanna do FUCK ALL. Makes SO's eyes bloodshot”
“Great for relaxing and just being happy”

“Nice mid-day hybrid with a perfectly balanced buzz that will keep your head in the clouds and a smile plastered to your face. Flavor for me is true to the name, sweet tropical start which is quickly overpowered by the longer lasting Exodus cheese finish.”
“Nice head buzz. Makes the smoker very happy and uplifted. Gives small burst of energy then mellows out. Tastes very much like the name suggests.”

“Very mellow and relaxing but not so heavy that I felt couch locked. Sometimes I felt a little dizzy and drunk and had to remember that I wasn't drinking, but other than that it was pleasant. What I liked the most was that I didn't feel nervous at all. This is a chill one for watching a funny movie.”

“Great stuff. I picked up half an ounce of this stuff at Backwood Cannabis Company and is absolutely worth the price. I rolled one gram in a joint and just puffed on it without even lighting it, and the taste comng off it was straight pineapples. You really want to eat it, it smells so good. 

But overall this stuff has really great body Affects, made me feel like i was floating in space when i closed my eyes and oret...”
“Really sweet cheese smell in bud and after  its broken up a bit the pineapple scent comes through. Put me straight down sleep after a day of work. Sweet, smooth smoke smells spectacular!!!”
“Love it , good flavor strong fragrance. Defiantly creepy but low on the parinoia, helps ok with back pain. Amazing !!”
“Just got it from Amsterdam.I travelled 12 hours from  Amsterdam to home, first thing I did is, roll one up and get high. By the time I finished my joint. My fatigue and stress was already finished.”

“Picked this up based only on the name as I love the fruity strains. You can really smell the fruit and cheese combination, very pungent. The buds were nothing special to look at but this strain was all about the taste. If you are familiar with the cheese strain it's very similar but with a hint of pineapple on the exhale, very nice. Effects were very sativa leaning to me, big head rush for the first 20-30 mins before...”
“The smell is jaw-dropping, like pina colada and cheese, while the high is strong in both body and mind.  Superb.”
“The perfect strain if you want that Indica full body effect, while still the Sativa uplift. In other words it knocks you out and keeps you going at the same time". haha”"

“Very head high kind of strain. Grew out 5 phenos of the plant and they're all consistent in terms of results. Little in terms of body feeling and not much pain relief. I think it's a milder sativa feeling but gives me brain confusion like not many other strains do. Basically when I have it, I'm wishing I was having something else even though the quality of the plant is there. It simply doesn't work for me in either a...”
“I always keep some of this around! Sweet and skunky. This strain will make any person happy for sure.”
“Heavy Heady Pineapple Indica”

“Roughly a 4.5, whatever, It fits my style!  Nice hybrid that I found sativa-leaning effect. Nice smooth fruity and citrus smell. Tastey but not mouth watering. As for the feel: an immediate cerebral the effect that gives some energy, then quickly gives way to relaxing and focused body and state of mind.lasts an hourish in small/regular size doses.  Very pleasant!!”

“This is the one that knocked me on my butt. In addition to full-body pulses of feeling, I could witness a blurry slideshow of a psychedelic trip if I surrounded myself in complete darkness. Therefore, it should be highly recommended for use in a sensory deprivation tank.”

“pineapple chunk is a almost euphoric high. pretty fast take off, so you might want to save it for places/people you feel comfortable with. tastes good, but don't hit it too hard if you don't want to cough hard. good for Sunday's.”

“Great taste, powerful effects and it makes me really horny which is always a plus. 
Energetic and you can be productive if you want. Great for nausea and appetite stimulation.”
“The strain has dense buds, big and solid I give a 4 due to it didn’t get me stoned enough, nice taste though just needed more of a punch to it”
“Very nice smoke. Perfect for playing video games, or even walking around the city. Nice big fluffy buds. A Pineapple Kush x Haze x Cheese hybrid.”
“It was an ok smoke little buds i guess the person i got jt from didnt have a good quality would have to try again very twiggy as well”

“****Everyday Seasoned Toker****


Pineapple Chunk

-Huge chunks out of the bag. 
-Smells like cheese and pineapple. 
-Heart rate increase immediately while smoking (125 BPM+)
-Feels heavy in the eyes. 
-Focused, anxious, high HR, heavy stone but not fuzzy. 

Was a top shelf strain ($225 oz.) and I would buy again. This strain could make for some amazing edibles as it hits pretty hard!”

“So far this is one of my favorites! Hits fast and hard, I get a little anxiety early on but I know within 10-15 minutes I will be relaxed and able to enjoy the relaxing yet cerebral buzz. Tastes great and smooth smoking as well.”

“To Pineapple Chunk is Outstanding, great strong smell of pineapple, sweet taste. A very good Hybrid, flowers look real nice. After smoking you'll get a very good buzz, lol that hair rising tingly feeling A rating”
“It was an ok smoke little buds i guess the person i got jt from didnt have a good quality would have to try again very twiggy as well”
“this is by far some of the best homegrown I've smoked, great head high follows by waves of europhia going though my body.”
“great taste and feeling”

“this is by far one of my favorite strains I've ever. the nugs are a beautiful dark forest green with orange hairs. this particular batch pineapple chunk #2" had an amazing cure with real dense buds with little rock sugar crystals everywhere. just really effing good bud.”"

“****Everyday Seasoned Toker****


Pineapple Chunk

-Huge chunks out of the bag. 
-Smells like cheese and pineapple. 
-Heart rate increase immediately while smoking (125 BPM+)
-Feels heavy in the eyes. 
-Focused, anxious, high HR, heavy stone but not fuzzy. 

Was a top shelf strain ($225 oz.) and I would buy again. This strain could make for some amazing edibles as it hits pretty hard!”
“like drining a small coffee at 7pm"  -Dr.haze

column1: enough energy to power through the cliffhanger but not enough to power through the next season

column3: “It was an ok smoke little buds i guess the person i got jt from didnt have a good quality would have to try again very twiggy as well”

“like drining a small coffee at 7pm"  -Dr.haze

column1: enough energy to power through the cliffhanger but not enough to power through the next season

column3: “bursting with flavor”

“I got this in the Midwest for awhile and really enjoyed the very tasty pineapple chunk. The taste is like over ripe pineapples. When in WA, I recommend Virginia co.
If it doesn’t smell like pineapple syrup it’s not this strain. A light smoke with heavy taste. PC gives me great euphoria, uplifting, and did I say very tasty? A nice middle ground of energy and relaxation. It’s almost all in the head, and mind. It’s not ...”
“Definitely a fast head buzz like the description says”
“It's got a slinky sweet taste to it with dense nugs”
“This was fruity, a nice daytime sativa provides just the right amount of motivation" to help thru the day.”"
“So smooth loved the taste”
“Strong stuff. Goes straight to your head, and your body follows the chillout soon after. Definitely don't need much! I'd use this at night, I think.”
“Beautiful, clean, crisp, cerebral strain and I think I had the prettiest nug in the picture collection”
“Great relaxing and uplifting sativa. Very happy and relaxed, makes nature more vibrant. Music sounds great”
“Dont use if you have racing or paranoid thoughts.”
“A light strain, not too energetic but not too tiered.  Really is in between of a sativa or indica.  Not bad for a quarter of a day until you start feeling a little lazy.”

“good strain. sweet taste with a very quick high. worked faster then sour Diesel to me but my opinion. I personally didn't feel any pain relief but my bottle says it has THC only no cbd. purchased this at my Anna location so they do have it. plus if you are a member then an ounce is 250.00 until March 4 2017 so I may be back soon..to early to tell if I like it that much.”

“Amazing high. I'm still high and I smoked this over 2 hours ago. It's a very spaced out high, kind of third person almost. Definate couch lock but that's accompanied by a very cerebral high that allows you to take all the energy that you don't use moving around, and focus it on whatever you're thinking about. Great weed to watch a movie on.”
“This strain hit quick and stayed with me, experienced slight cotton mouth and the munchies. This strain has a good balance between body and head high. Overall this bud is a 4.0/4.20”
“STRAIN OF THE YEAR!!! O M G”
“Love the small , love the taste it's a nice head high .. Will buy again one of my favorites”

“Just smoked a Q of this - nice tase, quite sticky, smell is meh.

It definitely is for body relaxation, I’ll be smoking this before my next spa day. It also made me feel pretty (seriously) horny

My brain was still focused without being anxious although I had took Xanax beforehand.

Didn’t make me hungry which is a pro since I’m trying to get health conscious lol

Overall I would say if your at the cinema, chilling w...”
“Very nice strain. I'm awake and alert, but getting ready for sleep. Definitely worth trying out if you haven't.”
“Lovely and strong on the mild side”
“Currently writing this high. I am absolutely shwumped. Tastes great”
“Definitely a fast head buzz like the description says”
“A high like no other”
“The strain has dense buds, big and solid I give a 4 due to it didn’t get me stoned enough, nice taste though just needed more of a punch to it”

“Very head high kind of strain. Grew out 5 phenos of the plant and they're all consistent in terms of results. Little in terms of body feeling and not much pain relief. I think it's a milder sativa feeling but gives me brain confusion like not many other strains do. Basically when I have it, I'm wishing I was having something else even though the quality of the plant is there. It simply doesn't work for me in either a...”
“This is a great strain! Unique taste and potent stone. Can knock the socks off an occasional toker.”
“Very tasty and smells delightful intense short lived high. Pretty big stems smokes fast”
“It most certainly is a creeper for me, but once it's there it's absolutely delightul, long lasting, and a little can go a long way”
“Flavorful and energetic. More of a sativa/head high. Little bit of anxiety keeps it from 5 stars. Nice skunky/juicy flavor.”

“I got this in the Midwest for awhile and really enjoyed the very tasty pineapple chunk. The taste is like over ripe pineapples. When in WA, I recommend Virginia co.
If it doesn’t smell like pineapple syrup it’s not this strain. A light smoke with heavy taste. PC gives me great euphoria, uplifting, and did I say very tasty? A nice middle ground of energy and relaxation. It’s almost all in the head, and mind. It’s not ...”

“Great taste, powerful effects and it makes me really horny which is always a plus. 
Energetic and you can be productive if you want. Great for nausea and appetite stimulation.”

“Roughly a 4.5, whatever, It fits my style!  Nice hybrid that I found sativa-leaning effect. Nice smooth fruity and citrus smell. Tastey but not mouth watering. As for the feel: an immediate cerebral the effect that gives some energy, then quickly gives way to relaxing and focused body and state of mind.lasts an hourish in small/regular size doses.  Very pleasant!!”
“The perfect strain if you want that Indica full body effect, while still the Sativa uplift. In other words it knocks you out and keeps you going at the same time". haha”"
“Just got it from Amsterdam.I travelled 12 hours from  Amsterdam to home, first thing I did is, roll one up and get high. By the time I finished my joint. My fatigue and stress was already finished.”
“A pretty heady hybrid. Very meditative but anything but energy draining. It actually made me a bit restless so maybe have an activity planned.”
“A solid strain. Lots of headbuzz and enjoyable foggyness. Good for hanging out and not doing anything too intense.”
“great strain awesome smell and flavour”

“Really easy to smoke, not harsh at all using water pipes and J 
Couch lock was heavy and everything was hazy...”

“This strain just became one of my new favorite hybrids. The high hits quick and hard in the head and then dissipates down into the rest of the body. Incredibly spacey and dream like come up followed by a very relaxing body high. Will be adding to my regular rotation. 🙏🏽”
“amazing stain, sweet and powerful”
“When I smoked this strain, I was blown away by it rather uplifting high and very skunky smell and flavor. Hands down in top 10, you won't find many bad qualities about this one”
“1 of my top 5 favorites!! Love the smell and taste! rock hard popcorn nugs”
“This was fruity, a nice daytime sativa provides just the right amount of motivation" to help thru the day.”"
“like drining a small coffee at 7pm"  -Dr.haze

column1: enough energy to power through the cliffhanger but not enough to power through the next season

column3:
“****Everyday Seasoned Toker****


Pineapple Chunk

-Huge chunks out of the bag. 
-Smells like cheese and pineapple. 
-Heart rate increase immediately while smoking (125 BPM+)
-Feels heavy in the eyes. 
-Focused, anxious, high HR, heavy stone but not fuzzy. 

Was a top shelf strain ($225 oz.) and I would buy again. This strain could make for some amazing edibles as it hits pretty hard!”

“This is the one that knocked me on my butt. In addition to full-body pulses of feeling, I could witness a blurry slideshow of a psychedelic trip if I surrounded myself in complete darkness. Therefore, it should be highly recommended for use in a sensory deprivation tank.”
“Heavy Heady Pineapple Indica”
“I always keep some of this around! Sweet and skunky. This strain will make any person happy for sure.”
“The smell is jaw-dropping, like pina colada and cheese, while the high is strong in both body and mind.  Superb.”

“Picked this up based only on the name as I love the fruity strains. You can really smell the fruit and cheese combination, very pungent. The buds were nothing special to look at but this strain was all about the taste. If you are familiar with the cheese strain it's very similar but with a hint of pineapple on the exhale, very nice. Effects were very sativa leaning to me, big head rush for the first 20-30 mins before...”
“Love it , good flavor strong fragrance. Defiantly creepy but low on the parinoia, helps ok with back pain. Amazing !!”

“nice citrusy flavors with an almost immediate high. I have heard that sour Diesel works quick but for me this was faster. smooth flavors with a cerebral high almost instantly for me. anxiety was fine so I had no worry about panic after smoking this nug.”

“This strain is sooo amazing good with the taste and how great the buds feel and look. When I first smoked PineApple Chuck it helped my stomach and my lower back pain. This kind of strain of weed is one of my new favorites on my top 10 favorite strains of Weed for pain and to help when you are feeling really said. It brings you back up and not feeling sad or anything like that. It makes you feel so happy I've not had ...”
“Great indiCa strain does the job with out any paranoia perfect for me”
“Smooth to toke, experienced high heart rate, a bit of paranoi, & some cotton mouth on some smoke outs, & little to none on others. Had no indica effect what so ever.”

“I normally prefer strong indica's because I have anxiety issues, but this strain did well managing my migraines. it is a very heady high tons of thc but it doesn't interfere with sleep or cause me to go manic. smell and taste are beautiful with sour notes.”
“one of the greatest strains I have had probably will always cop some if I can find it”
“Awesome cerebral effects leading to easy deep sleep after a few hours... Very relaxing body effects go with the cerebral energy buzz, it's an excellent medicine for pain, anxiety, and depression.”

“Started strong... very social and clear-headed, just a little racy. The cerebral buzz gave way to a very even and floaty body buzz after about 20-30 minutes. The strong portion of the buzz wore off fairly quickly (within an hour or so), but the mild, slightly intoxicated feeling lasted about 3 hours. For newbies, watch out for the strong, cerebral onset-- especially if you are prone to anxiety.

I would recommend thi...”
“brilliant strain. very cerebral high”

“You can touch it, smell it, taste it so sweet.
But it makes no difference cos it knocks you off your feet.”
“one of my favs”

“Very good smell. It wasn't instant but after about 5-10 min the effects hit you, similar to trainwreck. My headache disappeared and I was having a lot of deep and creative thoughts. Definitely a cerebral high but my body felt like it was on 10. I really like this strain.”
“It was a very mild strain giving a great body high. Negative was a little bit of paranoia but after from that all good.”

“Pineapple chunk is by far my favorite bud. It gives you the amazing body high that I love. I'm super relaxed and Horny lol the only downer is that it makes my heart race so if you have anxiety issues take it easy on this one.”
“my favourite strain great taste and good high”
“Good”
“Slow at 1st. Half way through a doob..plastered lol. Great terps. Amazing nugs. Skunky pineapple. Awesome head high for sure. wow.”
“Very nice aroma as well as taste! Definitely gonna go slow on this batch and enjoy it”
“It smokes good! it tastes good but I got a headache after smoking it! it does give u a little boost of energy! Only 4 stars for me.. would be 5 if not for thus headache lol..”
“Second favorite strain.”
“So glad I found this strain! It's amazing and tastes incredible especially when rolled up. Perfect for day time use.”
“bursting with flavor”
“It was an ok smoke little buds i guess the person i got jt from didnt have a good quality would have to try again very twiggy as well”
“Very nice smoke. Perfect for playing video games, or even walking around the city. Nice big fluffy buds. A Pineapple Kush x Haze x Cheese hybrid.”

“pineapple chunk is a almost euphoric high. pretty fast take off, so you might want to save it for places/people you feel comfortable with. tastes good, but don't hit it too hard if you don't want to cough hard. good for Sunday's.”
“Awesome strain great taste and stone”

“So far this is one of my favorites! Hits fast and hard, I get a little anxiety early on but I know within 10-15 minutes I will be relaxed and able to enjoy the relaxing yet cerebral buzz. Tastes great and smooth smoking as well.”

“To Pineapple Chunk is Outstanding, great strong smell of pineapple, sweet taste. A very good Hybrid, flowers look real nice. After smoking you'll get a very good buzz, lol that hair rising tingly feeling A rating”
“this is by far some of the best homegrown I've smoked, great head high follows by waves of europhia going though my body.”
“great taste and feeling”

“this is by far one of my favorite strains I've ever. the nugs are a beautiful dark forest green with orange hairs. this particular batch pineapple chunk #2" had an amazing cure with real dense buds with little rock sugar crystals everywhere. just really effing good bud.”"

“Slow grow! But worth the time. It's a 
Rolling Stones ride.”

“My favourite smelling strain of all time! The pineapple smell is very distinct, although the musky/earthiness of the cheese and skunk are in the background. The high is very social, lasted approx. 2 hours and made me laugh the whole time. The buds are a light to mid green and covered in crystal.”

“Very smooth, personally it didn't have much flavor, but it did have a light pleasant taste. Best for a head high leaving you giggling and smiling for no reason, but there is a very immobilizing factor to it. Only down side is it leads to a large amount of munchies with a hint of paranoia. Overall not to bad”

“From smell, flavor, and overall high this is an amazing cross.  Don't kid yourself, this is a serious medicinal strain.  Relaxing, spirit lifting, slight body buzz; sedating, anxiety reliever.... its got it all.”
“It's got a slinky sweet taste to it with dense nugs”

“This is the perfect strain if you prefer sativa. 
Good relaxed,pain-free buzz. But doesn't make you sleepy”

“The essence and flavor of Pineapple Chunk is immediately obvious. Its aroma of earthy Cheese X Skunk is backed up by a secondary scent of Pineapple. The taste is delicious and unique. Earthy flavors are underpinned by a strong tasty Pineapple aftershock. A massive THC output and high CBD gives a powerful couch lock effect.
80% Indica
20% Sativa”

“Pineapple Chunk 

Pineapple x Skunk #1 x Cheese 

Good strain i was surprised Leafly dident have pineapple chunk on here so i put up.

Pretty heavy hitting and really euphoric, mad couch lock helps u relax and be happy.”

“First time posting a second review on the same strain but I have to say it is quite worthy a strain for a second posting!  This is one of the best strains I have ever tried.  Perfect in so many ways. Love the taste and love the pain relief even more.  In my opinion this is top shelf quality and consistent every time it is fired up.”

“I had the pleasure of ordering this as a shatter via THCAlternatives. One of the best shatter compounds I have come across since making the switch this past May. 

The hit is bold and extremely flavorful. The batch has an undeniable potency resulting in immediate onset. Exhaling, the vapor seems slightly sweeter. The resulting effects are those of a typical hybrid strain, but with a higher energy level. This strain h...”
“Not my favorite, I gotta sit and smoke longer than I normally do to catch a buzz but the high is great super calm and relaxed.”

“Great strain, flavor was on point sweet citrusy with a little skunk after taste, high was relaxing with a very intense head high gave it a 4/5 because it he high was short lived hour maybe hour and a half and I smoke a gram in 2 bowls”

“Nice smooth fruity flavor when vaped through my SSV, it tasted more pungent when I've tried it through my pax 2, both on medium heat settings. Slight eye droop and great relaxation, almost no couchlock for me and yet it is perfect for gaming. Was adventuring in the outdoors of Fallout 4 and I had such tunnel vision I spent what felt like an hour searching one tiny corner of the map...turns out it was only 10 minutes ...”
“wow great strain”
“Love it JAH”
“Amazing. A wonderful high. Highly recommended. Grab a joimt”
“super potent strain, good for afternoon use. thc well over 20% and the pineapple skunky flavor really brings this strain to life. very enjoyable would recomend”

“Red Cherry Berry is great offering from Barney's Farm in lovely Amsterdam. By backcrossing their best skunk plant with its California Indica ancestors, this strain was developed for Indica lovers who like a bit of cerebral high with a restful, body stone. The taste and aroma of Red Cherry Berry recall childhood visits to the sweet shop and the lingering fruit flavors of the highest quality hard candy.”
“Easy smoke, good flavor, very relaxing but highly cerebral. I've found it a gentle strain on your head and body.”
“Decent.  Good for relaxation along with having a wonderful taste.”
“Great sleep strain!”

“great. tried some from the east coast, outdoor, it really does have a fast paced lift. for an Indica it has real Sativa characters. couldn't enjoy the aroma due to transport. seems. that would have made it a four or five star.”
“God's gift to me”

“I grew this one myself at home and therefore had a stock of it for 4-months. It was ready in just over 7-weeks, which is great for such a high-yielder (650g/sm), and was also very easy to grow and had no issues along the way. It was such a beautiful, strong and symmetrical plant to watch grow and handled a SCROG system and plenty of high stress training really, really well.

The buds had a lovely warm and pungent, sp...”
“relaxing, head and body high. not my favorite for a daytime smoke. mild couchlock. smells better than a real pineapple. such a great smell opening the jar.”
“Got this from a friend a while ago and didnt like it. This time I got it from sticky ypsi and it was awesome. great indica dominant strain. Not something I would do during the day. Not early.”
“I found in green parrot seeds, but now is out of stock. It's the best pineapple”
“Beautiful”
“This is a great smoke and recommend this to anyone looking to have a few good hours.”
“Dope strain”

“the aroma opening the jar is something to cherish. amazing blend of sweet pineapple and cheese. the taste is nice and smooth and almost as good as the smell. nice and heavy high mind and body. great for relaxing after a long day”
“Major euphoria, head high, headache, dry mucous membranes.”
“Very relaxing, didn't leave me confused or jumping from thought to thought, and gave me a great night of sleep 😸”

“this strian is my favorite strian I ever grew they had 4 different phenos I only saw 3 out the four phenos types my favorite phenos type grew like a monster and smelt and tasted just like striaght cheese and a little bit of pineapple behind it my other phenos had a striaght pineapple sweet smell and third phenos tasted striaght like cheese no sweet striaght cheese skunk best bud to grow for beginners”

“Recently, I tried a pineapple chunk honey crystal concentrate produced by oleum extracts. The flavor in this concentrate is excellent, the terpy pineapple tastiness leaves your pallet watering & eager for more.  This concentrate also packs a potent punch producing a mental euphoria that eventually leaves your mind/body equally relaxed.  Excellent concentrate”
“Really pineapple”

“Pineapple chunk: great taste, smooth, good Stoney high that calms you down but keeps you going at the same time. The day I smoked this was the day limpbizkit was talking about. My tranny had blown, my moms car got a flat and I worked 14 hours.. after smoking this I relaxed and calmed down. I was giggly and very.. studious? I was observing everything and enjoying it”

“not a strong and clean like haze, its something like an indica that won't get you sleepy,  but her best is the taste and aroma, STRONG taste of something like a fruit haze, remember a little bit amnezia haze, A LITTLE BIT. great strain.”

“Flavor: Earthy Flavors with a tasty pineapple aftershock
Aroma: Earthy Cheese Skunk with a hint of Pineapple
Effects: Body and Head High - Spacey”
“Awesome buzz! I'm not feeling the Indica too much. It was a first of the morning smoke and I am ready for the day. Not to lay around all day”

“It gave me
 a head buzz trippy high the first time I smoked it. It also gave me dry mouth”

“i smoked this strain in my new arizer solo vaporizer,  and I can definitely taste pineapple, it's not so much as harsh but its really smooth. it start with a very immobilizing body high and slows down to an intoxicating head high that'll have you smiling without noticing. down right best strain I've ever tried”
“Very fruity and light, long lasting high.”
“Great High.Long High.Makes u feel like ur in a dream.Recommend.”

“Picked up some of the honeycomb by : CannaVative -   THC - 64.78 %  CBD-0.39% 

I like their honeycomb products- have tried many of them ... Great consistency, easy to work with 😉👍🏼
This Pineapple Chunk has a nice taste , which isn't surprising looking at the lineage of this strain 😄👌🏼 🍍, 🧀, skunk .. What's not to like 😊👍🏼. 
Feel it in the face - almost instantly ! Then the eyes start getting that droop on...”

“Tried this strain just yesterday. smooth smoke, lovely tropical smell. Excellent for reducing and curbing anxiety, tension, and stress. little to no paranoia associated commonly with high THC strains. come down is energizing.”
“This strain is AMAZING and taste so good! The high hits hard and fairly quickly too. I highly recommend this strain to all indica lovers. A full body high. Smells wonderful!”

“such a good strain. beautiful think dense buds with think layer of sugary crystals everywhere. such a nice indica hybrid with the perfect amount of sativa leaving me filled with creativity all while still feeling the good indica stoned feeling. I love this effing bud.”

“Dérivé du Cheese. Je n'aime pas trop cette odeur très forte et pas particulièrement agréable

Ce n'est pas ma sorte préférée mais de temps en temps c'est agréable.”
“what a Great strain tastes like the parents 4sure the high is great the Nugz are killa deff a great hybrid.”
“Also a really good strain, though its a hybrid this strain is indica dominant with the so called ''couchlock'' effect”
“I have this strain first thing in a.m. and wow do I wake up! Love it”
